context: Hello Tell me what kind of movies would you like to watch? i can recommed you a lot of movies

I really like Sci Fi movies. I recently watched Lost in Space (1998) and loved it!
if youy like old movies and smile with your family

resp: i can recommend you The Mask (1994) which was made by Jin Carrey
